alert.note: Alert for Leake; Newton; Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 10:29PM CDT until July 21 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Leake County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Northeastern Smith County in central Mississippi... Scott County in central Mississippi... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1028 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Steele, or near Harperville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Forest around 1040 PM CDT. Lawrence around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lena, Walnut Grove and Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
